It looks like the issue is being caused by the KSP compatibility check that is used by several plugins from a range of authors. The behavior of this checking has changed in newer versions, and if any third-party plugin (FAR, for example) is using a newer version than the one in the Toolbar Plugin, that would cause problems.

Please hang on while my fellow plugin developers and I are working on it.
